en.text:
h      Show all possible actions
ls      Show all to do items ordered by date in descending order
a(params: title)      Add a new to do item
e(params: id,title)     Edit a to do item
d(params: id)      Delete a to do item
t(params: id)      Toggle a to do item
s(params: word)      Search for to do items with titles that contain the inserted word
